room_title: Escape room "Murder at Denbrough Mansion" by Escape from St. Louis in St. Louis
review: We went as a double date and did the Murder Mystery. It was challenging but fun. I thought 4 people was a perfect amount for this one. Had a great time and definitely plan to go back again.

room_title: Escape room "Murder at Denbrough Mansion" by Escape from St. Louis in St. Louis
review: We went with 7 people (family and friends). We had a blast doing The Murder at Denbrough Mansion room and were able to escape in 55 minutes and 29 seconds. This is a good team building and organizational event. We plan to come back and do another room in the near future!

room_title: Escape room "Murder at Denbrough Mansion" by Escape from St. Louis in St. Louis
review: Five of us did the Murder Mystery escape room and loved it! The puzzles were challenging but not impossible. I loved how they incorporated some clever little electronic surprises. All in all it was a great time!
